email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Durban. Could you provide a rate estimate for this shipment? We are considering CFR terms and would appreciate details on laycan and vessel availability.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Emma,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 50,000, LOA: 200m) for your shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 45 per MT on CFR terms. Laycan is 25-30 March. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high. Could you consider USD 42 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Emma,

We can adjust the rate to USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please let us know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

USD 43 per MT and the demurrage rate of USD 15,000 per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send us the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Emma,

Thank you for confirming. We have secured the MV SEA HORIZON for your shipment. The laycan remains 25-30 March. We will send the booking confirmation and other necessary documents shortly.

Best regards,
Alex Miller
